name: Estelle
desc: The owner of Beaumont Workshop. After working at the Fontaine Research Institute as a renowned scientist, she now uses her skills to develop advanced Fontainian machinery to aid her forging as a blacksmith.

customize.name: Diagram: Finale of the Deep
customize.desc: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Finale of the Deep (Sword).

customize.name: Bulle Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

customize.name: Tidalga
customize.desc: An algae floating with the tides that sustains itself by feeding on substances produced by other plants. Though often mistaken for zooplankton, based on its nature, Tidalga is actually a type of phytoplankton.

customize.name: Condessence Crystal
customize.desc: A bright and clear crystal with a core that is both tough and malleable.

customize.name: Diagram: Song of Stillness
customize.desc: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Song of Stillness (Bow).

customize.name: Pluie Lotus
customize.desc: A plant that grows in environments rich with Hydro. This plant can be found everywhere in Fontaine after its long rainy seasons. The plant is named "Pluie" — which means "rain" in the local tongue — for that reason.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Condessence Crystal
customize.desc: A bright and clear crystal with a core that is both tough and malleable.

customize.name: Diagram: Tidal Shadow
customize.desc: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Tidal Shadow (Claymore).

customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

customize.name: Condessence Crystal

customize.name: Condessence Crystal
customize.desc: A bright and clear crystal with a core that is both tough and malleable.

customize.name: Silver Sword
customize.desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Old Merc's Pal
customize.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Iron Point
customize.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Pocket Grimoire
customize.desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
customize.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

voice.title: More improvements...
voice.desc: *sigh* There's still a lot of room for improvement with this machine...

imgDesc.text: Court of Fontaine: Vasari Passage - Fontaine
